price: 12. Or seul (l’homme pervers), livré à ses abus et à ses péchés, tient ce jour pour mensonge.
arabic: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamā yukadhibu bihi illā kullu muʿ'tadin athīmin
